duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide nursing care and medical-surgical support to patients in a healthcare facility.
Conduct patient assessments and develop individualized care plans based on medical-surgical needs.
Monitor and provide critical care to patients in the medical-surgical unit.
Communicate effectively with patients, families, and healthcare team members.
Demonstrate empathy, compassion, and problem-solving skills in patient care.
Collaborate with healthcare professionals to ensure high-quality medical-surgical care.
